channel.title: New Season of Fire Team Charlie (Fort Team Charlie)
channel.description:
I am only the messenger. I will repeat, I AM ONLY THE MESSENGER, and am not associated with this project. Now that I have expressed that tid-bit, I now announce you the continuation of the Fire Team Charlie machinima series through the Team Fortress 2 engine. The creators have dubbed it Fort Team Charlie. Despite the change of pace, it's still partially connected with the halo universe. If you weren't fans of the original, I am sorry I couldn't help the fact that you are dead inside. Here are the links that will have more pertinent info :stuck_out_tongue: :
[url]https://www.facebook.com/pages/Fort-Team-Charlie/134496596592711[/url] [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cQUtNMVr1E0[/url]
![](upload://lUdEwh31W1oXbAS0QC9AUY80tMc.jpeg)

item.title: New Season of Fire Team Charlie (Fort Team Charlie)
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Oh, god I remember FTC.

Shit was boss. Or so I remember. It’s been a REAL fucking long time.

Read full topic
item.source: New Season of Fire Team Charlie (Fort Team Charlie)

item.title: New Season of Fire Team Charlie (Fort Team Charlie)

item.description:
I am only the messenger. I will repeat, I AM ONLY THE MESSENGER, and am not associated with this project. Now that I have expressed that tid-bit, I now announce you the continuation of the Fire Team Charlie machinima series through the Team Fortress 2 engine. The creators have dubbed it Fort Team Charlie. Despite the change of pace, it’s still partially connected with the halo universe.
